phase: Phase 5 - Rebranding Verification & Stripe Checkout Testing
summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Working Tracker rebranding and Stripe checkout integration. All features working correctly: 1) Stripe checkout redirects to checkout.stripe.com, 2) 'Working Tracker' branding appears across all pages (Login, Signup, Dashboard sidebar, Team Chat), 3) Signup page pricing widget shows '$2.99/user/month' and '14-day free trial' with link to /pricing, 4) Checkout page shows Order Summary with Card/PayPal/Payoneer/Wise options and auto-recurring checkbox, 5) AI Chatbot responds with 'Working Tracker' branding and support@workingtracker.com email.
passed_tests: API /api/payments/checkout/session - Monthly plan creates Stripe checkout session with redirect URL
API /api/payments/checkout/session - Yearly plan creates Stripe checkout session
API /api/payments/checkout/session - Invalid plan returns 400
API /api/payments/checkout/session - Zero users returns 400
API /api/chat/ai/query - AI chatbot responds with 'Working Tracker' branding
API /api/chat/ai/query - AI chatbot provides support@workingtracker.com email
API /api/chat/ai/query - AI chatbot does NOT use old 'WorkMonitor' branding
API /api/pricing/plans - Starter plan price is $2.99/user/month
API /api/pricing/plans - Free trial is 14 days
API /api/pricing/plans - All plans have 20% yearly discount
Frontend Signup Page - 'Working Tracker' branding visible
Frontend Signup Page - Pricing widget visible with '$2.99/user/month'
Frontend Signup Page - '14-day free trial' text visible
Frontend Signup Page - Pricing widget links to /pricing
Frontend Login Page - 'Working Tracker' branding visible
Frontend Pricing Page - 3 plan cards (Starter $2.99, Pro $4.99, Business $6.99)
Frontend Pricing Page - 14-Day Free Trial badge visible
Frontend Checkout Page - Order Summary visible
Frontend Checkout Page - Card/PayPal/Payoneer/Wise payment options visible
Frontend Checkout Page - Auto-recurring checkbox visible
Frontend Checkout Page - Complete Purchase button visible
Frontend Dashboard - 'Working Tracker' branding in sidebar
Frontend Team Chat - 'Working Tracker AI Assistant' branding visible
updated_files: /app/tests/test_rebranding_stripe.py - Created new test file for rebranding and Stripe checkout verification
mocked_apis_note: PayPal, Payoneer, Wise payment methods are MOCKED placeholders - only Stripe/Card is fully integrated. Video screenshots, Custom report builder, and SAML SSO are also MOCKED.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All rebranding from WorkMonitor to Working Tracker is complete and verified. Stripe checkout integration is working - creates checkout sessions that redirect to checkout.stripe.com. AI chatbot correctly uses 'Working Tracker' branding and support@workingtracker.com email. Pricing widget on signup page shows correct pricing ($2.99/user/month) and 14-day free trial. All 3 pricing tiers (Starter $2.99, Pro $4.99, Business $6.99) with 20% yearly discount are working.
